message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and efficiency. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15000 to you. Considering the quality and benefits this product offers, I am proposing to sell it to you for $14000. This represents an excellent opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive price. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. I look forward to your positive response.
